message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $100. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to both of us.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm willing to meet you halfway, considering the product is worth $80 to you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I must maintain my minimum price for the product. I would like to offer it to you for $90, which I believe is a fair compromise given its value to both of us.
I understand you want to maintain your minimum price, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $80 and $90, so I'll offer $85.
